TopicTitle: Top O' the mornin' to yah!

Articles.Content:
Heh, different title than others

Hello! I've been playing KSP since it went on steam, and I can't get anything out of the atmosphere .

I'd like to say that one day I want to be making Mods, I might start with an SRB pack, as I LOVE using them...Even if they explode my spacecraft

That's all from me for now, see you around!
and the rest of the day to yourself. But Seriously. Don't worry, you'll get there eventually, it just takes practice.

Start launching simple single stage designs. Learn how to fly them in suborbital trajectories. Then, design a simple two stage, get it into orbit, and back. A well designed one can reach and return from the Kerbal moons.

Keep going small steps at a time and you will eventually reach all the planets and their moons in the Kerbal Solar System and back.

welcome fellow newcomer

I find getting a good orbit the most difficult in kerbal so far just keep trying and check out some youtube guides and u'll be fine

Here's a little rocket that can reach orbit, and instructions on how to get it there: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25008-How-to-reach-orbit-and-a-rocket-that-can-do-it-a-walkthrough-for-newbies
